document.full_text: thanks to a flurry of foul calls at the end of the game, no. 8 butler managed to outlast the no. 1 panthers on a matt howard free throw with .8 of a second remaining.
document.title: southeast: butler 71, pittsburgh 70: when the whistles stop, butler beats pittsburgh
lines_and_colors: thanks to a flurry of foul calls at the end of the game, no. 8 butler managed to outlast the no. 1 panthers on a matt howard free throw with .8 of a second remaining.
